column2: Alma 33:6 6 And again, O God, when I did turn to my house thou didst hear me in my prayer.
column3: Alma thirty three to six six And again, O God, when I did turn to my house thou didst hear me in my prayer.

column2: Alma 33:7 7 And when I did turn unto my closet, O Lord, and prayed unto thee, thou didst hear me.
column3: Alma thirty three to seven seven And when I did turn unto my closet, O Lord, and prayed unto thee, thou didst hear me.

column2: Alma 33:8 8 Yea, thou art merciful unto thy children when they cry unto thee, to be heard of thee and not of men, and thou wilt hear them.
column3: Alma thirty three to eight eight Yea, thou art merciful unto thy children when they cry unto thee, to be heard of thee and not of men, and thou wilt hear them.

column2: Alma 33:9 9 Yea, O God, thou hast been merciful unto me, and heard my cries in the midst of thy congregations.
column3: Alma thirty three to nine nine Yea ,O God, thou hast been merciful unto me, and heard my cries in the midst of thy congregations.

column2: Alma 33:10 10 Yea, and thou hast also heard me when I have been cast out and have been despised by mine enemies; yea, thou didst hear my cries, and wast angry with mine enemies, and thou didst visit them in thine anger with speedy destruction.
column3: Alma thirty three to ten ten Yea, and thou hast also heard me when I have been cast out and have been despised by mine enemies; yea, thou didst hear my cries, and wast angry with mine enemies, and thou didst visit them in thine anger with speedy destruction.

column2: Alma 33:11 11 And thou didst hear me because of mine afflictions and my sincerity; and it is because of thy Son that thou hast been thus merciful unto me, therefore I will cry unto thee in all mine afflictions, for in thee is my joy; for thou hast turned thy judgments away from me, because of thy Son.
column3: Alma thirty three to eleven eleven And thou didst hear me because of mine afflictions and my sincerity; and it is because of thy Son that thou hast been thus merciful unto me, therefore I will cry unto thee in all mine afflictions, for in thee is my joy; for thou hast turned thy judgments away from me, because of thy Son.

column2: Alma 33:12 12 And now Alma said unto them: Do ye believe those scriptures which have been written by them of old?
column3: Alma thirty three to twelve twelve And now Alma said unto them: Do ye believe those scriptures which have been written by them of old?

column2: Alma 33:13 13 Behold, if ye do, ye must believe what Zenos said; for, behold he said: Thou hast turned away thy judgments because of thy Son.
column3: Alma thirty three to thirteen thirteen Behold, if ye do, ye must believe what Zenos said; for, behold he said: Thou hast turned away thy judgments because of thy Son.

column2: Alma 33:14 14 Now behold, my brethren, I would ask if ye have read the scriptures?
column3: Alma thirty three to fourteen fourteen Now behold, my brethren, I would ask if ye have read the scriptures?

column2: If ye have, how can ye disbelieve on the Son of God?
column3: If ye have, how can ye disbelieve on the Son of God?

column2: Alma 33:15 15 For it is not written that Zenos alone spake of these things, but Zenock also spake of these things--
column3: Alma thirty three to fifteen fifteen For it is not written that Zenos alone spake of these things, but Zenock also spake of these things-

column2: Alma 33:16 16 For behold, he said: Thou art angry, O Lord, with this people, because they will not understand thy mercies which thou hast bestowed upon them because of thy Son.
column3: Alma thirty three to sixteen sixteen For behold, he said: Thou art angry, O Lord, with this people, because they will not understand thy mercies which thou hast bestowed upon them because of thy Son.

column2: Alma 33:17 17 And now, my brethren, ye see that a second prophet of old has testified of the Son of God, and because the people would not understand his words they stoned him to death.
column3: Alma thirty three to seventeen seventeen And now, my brethren, ye see that a second prophet of old has testified of the Son of God, and because the people would not understand his words they stoned him to death.

column2: Alma 33:18 18 But behold, this is not all; these are not the only ones who have spoken concerning the Son of God.
column3: Alma thirty three to eighteen eighteen But behold, this is not all; these are not the only ones who have spoken concerning the Son of God.

column2: Alma 33:19 19 Behold, he was spoken of by Moses; yea, and behold a type was raised up in the wilderness, that whosoever would look upon it might live.
column3: Alma thirty three to nineteen nineteen Behold, he was spoken of by Moses; yea, and behold a type was raised up in the wilderness, that whosoever would look upon it might live.

column2: And many did look and live.
column3: And many did look and live.

column2: Alma 33:20 20 But few understood the meaning of those things, and this because of the hardness of their hearts.
column3: Alma thirty three to twenty twenty But few understood the meaning of those things, and this because of the hardness of their hearts.

column2: But there were many who were so hardened that they would not look, therefore they perished.
column3: But there were many who were so hardened that they would not look, therefore they perished.

column2: Now the reason they would not look is because they did not believe that it would heal them.
column3: Now the reason they would not look is because they did not believe that it would heal them.

column2: Alma 33:21 21 O my brethren, if ye could be healed by merely casting about your eyes that ye might be healed, would ye not behold quickly, or would ye rather harden your hearts in unbelief, and be slothful, that ye would not cast about your eyes, that ye might perish?
column3: Alma thirty three to twenty one twenty one O my brethren, if ye could be healed by merely casting about your eyes that ye might be healed, would ye not behold quickly, or would ye rather harden your hearts in unbelief, and be slothful, that ye would not cast about your eyes, that ye might perish?

column2: Alma 33:22 22 If so, wo shall come upon you; but if not so, then cast about your eyes and begin to believe in the Son of God, that he will come to redeem his people, and that he shall suffer and die to atone for their sins; and that he shall rise again from the dead, which shall bring to pass the resurrection, that all men shall stand before him, to be judged at the last and judgment day, according to their works.
column3: Alma thirty three to twenty two twenty two If so, wo shall come upon you; but if not so, then cast about your eyes and begin to believe in the Son of God, that he will come to redeem his people, and that he shall suffer and die to atone for their sins; and that he shall rise again from the dead, which shall bring to pass the resurrection, that all men shall stand before him, to be judged at the last and judgment day, according to their works.

column2: Alma 33:23 23 And now, my brethren, I desire that ye shall plant this word in your hearts, and as it beginneth to swell even so nourish it by your faith.
column3: Alma thirty three to twenty three twenty three And now, my brethren, I desire that ye shall plant this word in your hearts, and as it beginneth to swell even so nourish it by your faith.

column2: And behold, it will become a tree, springing up in you unto everlasting life.
column3: And behold, it will become a tree, springing up in you unto everlasting life.

column2: And then may God grant unto you that your burdens may be light, through the joy of his Son.
column3: And then may God grant unto you that your burdens may be light, through the joy of his Son.

column2: And even all this can ye do if ye will.
column3: And even all this can ye do if ye will.

column2: Amen.
column3: Amen.

column2: Alma 34 Chapter 34
column3: Alma thirty four Chapter thirty four

column2: Alma 34:1 1 And now it came to pass that after Alma had spoken these words unto them he sat down upon the ground, and Amulek arose and began to teach them, saying:
column3: Alma thirty four to one one And now it came to pass that after Alma had spoken these words unto them he sat down upon the ground, and Amulek arose and began to teach them, saying:

column2: Alma 34:2 2 My brethren, I think that it is impossible that ye should be ignorant of the things which have been spoken concerning the coming of Christ, who is taught by us to be the Son of God; yea, I know that these things were taught unto you bountifully before your dissension from among us.
column3: Alma thirty four to two two My brethren, I think that it is impossible that ye should be ignorant of the things which have been spoken concerning the coming of Christ, who is taught by us to be the Son of God; yea, I know that these things were taught unto you bountifully before your dissension from among us.

column2: Alma 34:3 3 And as ye have desired of my beloved brother that he should make known unto you what ye should do, because of your afflictions; and he hath spoken somewhat unto you to prepare your minds; yea, and he hath exhorted you unto faith and to patience--
column3: Alma thirty four to three three And as ye have desired of my beloved brother that he should make known unto you what ye should do, because of your afflictions; and he hath spoken somewhat unto you to prepare your minds; yea, and he hath exhorted you unto faith and to patience-

column2: Alma 34:4 4 Yea, even that ye would have so much faith as even to plant the word in your hearts, that ye may try the experiment of its goodness.
column3: Alma thirty four to four four Yea, even that ye would have so much faith as even to plant the word in your hearts, that ye may try the experiment of its goodness.

column2: Alma 34:5 5 And we have beheld that the great question which is in your minds is whether the word be in the Son of God, or whether there shall be no Christ.
column3: Alma thirty four to five five And we have beheld that the great question which is in your minds is whether the word be in the Son of God, or whether there shall be no Christ.

column2: Alma 34:6 6 And ye also beheld that my brother has proved unto you, in many instances, that the word is in Christ unto salvation.
column3: Alma thirty four to six six And ye also beheld that my brother has proved unto you, in many instances, that the word is in Christ unto salvation.

column2: Alma 34:7 7 My brother has called upon the words of Zenos, that redemption cometh through the Son of God, and also upon the words of Zenock; and also he has appealed unto Moses, to prove that these things are true.
column3: Alma thirty four to seven seven My brother has called upon the words of Zenos, that redemption cometh through the Son of God, and also upon the words of Zenock; and also he has appealed unto Moses, to prove that these things are true.

column2: Alma 34:8 8 And now, behold, I will testify unto you of myself that these things are true.
column3: Alma thirty four to eight eight And now, behold, I will testify unto you of myself that these things are true.

column2: Behold, I say unto you, that I do know that Christ shall come among the children of men, to take upon him the transgressions of his people, and that he shall atone for the sins of the world; for the Lord God hath spoken it.
column3: Behold, I say unto you, that I do know that Christ shall come among the children of men, to take upon him the transgressions of his people, and that he shall atone for the sins of the world; for the Lord God hath spoken it.

column2: Alma 34:9 9 For it is expedient that an atonement should be made; for according to the great plan of the Eternal God there must be an atonement made, or else all mankind must unavoidably perish; yea, all are hardened; yea, all are fallen and are lost, and must perish except it be through the atonement which it is expedient should be made.
column3: Alma thirty four to nine nine For it is expedient that an atonement should be made; for according to the great plan of the Eternal God there must be an atonement made, or else all mankind must unavoidably perish; yea, all are hardened; yea, all are fallen and are lost, and must perish except it be through the atonement which it is expedient should be made.

column2: Alma 34:10 10 For it is expedient that there should be a great and last sacrifice; yea, not a sacrifice of man, neither of beast, neither of any manner of fowl; for it shall not be a human sacrifice; but it must be an infinite and eternal sacrifice.
column3: Alma thirty four to ten ten For it is expedient that there should be a great and last sacrifice; yea, not a sacrifice of man, neither of beast, neither of any manner of fowl; for it shall not be a human sacrifice; but it must be an infinite and eternal sacrifice.

column2: Alma 34:11 11 Now there is not any man that can sacrifice his own blood which will atone for the sins of another.
column3: Alma thirty four to eleven eleven Now there is not any man that can sacrifice his own blood which will atone for the sins of another.

column2: Now, if a man murdereth, behold will our law, which is just, take the life of his brother?
column3: Now, if a man murdereth, behold will our law, which is just, take the life of his brother?

column2: I say unto you, Nay.
column3: I say unto you, Nay.

column2: Alma 34:12 12 But the law requireth the life of him who hath murdered; therefore there can be nothing which is short of an infinite atonement which will suffice for the sins of the world.
column3: Alma thirty four to twelve twelve But the law requireth the life of him who hath murdered; therefore there can be nothing which is short of an infinite atonement which will suffice for the sins of the world.

column2: Alma 34:13 13 Therefore, it is expedient that there should be a great and last sacrifice; and then shall there be, or it is expedient there should be, a stop to the shedding of blood; then shall the law of Moses be fulfilled; yea, it shall be all fulfilled, every jot and tittle, and none shall have passed away.
column3: Alma thirty four to thirteen thirteen Therefore, it is expedient that there should be a great and last sacrifice; and then shall there be, or it is expedient there should be, a stop to the shedding of blood; then shall the law of Moses be fulfilled; yea, it shall be all fulfilled, every jot and tittle, and none shall have passed away.

column2: Alma 34:14 14 And behold, this is the whole meaning of the law, every whit pointing to that great and last sacrifice; and that great and last sacrifice will be the Son of God, yea, infinite and eternal.
column3: Alma thirty four to fourteen fourteen And behold, this is the whole meaning of the law, every whit pointing to that great and last sacrifice; and that great and last sacrifice will be the Son of God, yea, infinite and eternal.

column2: Alma 34:15 15 And thus he shall bring salvation to all those who shall believe on his name; this being the intent of this last sacrifice, to bring about the bowels of mercy, which overpowereth justice, and bringeth about means unto men that they may have faith unto repentance.
column3: Alma thirty four to fifteen fifteen And thus he shall bring salvation to all those who shall believe on his name; this being the intent of this last sacrifice, to bring about the bowels of mercy, which overpowereth justice, and bringeth about means unto men that they may have faith unto repentance.

column2: Alma 34:16 16 And thus mercy can satisfy the demands of justice, and encircles them in the arms of safety, while he that exercises no faith unto repentance is exposed to the whole law of the demands of justice; therefore only unto him that has faith unto repentance is brought about the great and eternal plan of redemption.
column3: Alma thirty four to sixteen sixteen And thus mercy can satisfy the demands of justice, and encircles them in the arms of safety, while he that exercises no faith unto repentance is exposed to the whole law of the demands of justice; therefore only unto him that has faith unto repentance is brought about the great and eternal plan of redemption.

column2: Alma 34:17 17 Therefore may God grant unto you, my brethren, that ye may begin to exercise your faith unto repentance, that ye begin to call upon his holy name, that he would have mercy upon you;
column3: Alma thirty four to seventeen seventeen Therefore may God grant unto you, my brethren, that ye may begin to exercise your faith unto repentance, that ye begin to call upon his holy name, that he would have mercy upon you;

column2: Alma 34:18 18 Yea, cry unto him for mercy; for he is mighty to save.
column3: Alma thirty four to eighteen eighteen Yea, cry unto him for mercy; for he is mighty to save.

column2: Alma 34:19 19 Yea, humble yourselves, and continue in prayer unto him.
column3: Alma thirty four to nineteen nineteen Yea, humble yourselves, and continue in prayer unto him.

column2: Alma 34:20 20 Cry unto him when ye are in your fields, yea, over all your flocks.
column3: Alma thirty four to twenty twenty Cry unto him when ye are in your fields, yea, over all your flocks.

column2: Alma 34:21 21 Cry unto him in your houses, yea, over all your household, both morning, mid-day, and evening.
column3: Alma thirty four to twenty one twenty one Cry unto him in your houses, yea, over all your household, both morning, mid day, and evening.

column2: Alma 34:22 22 Yea, cry unto him against the power of your enemies.
column3: Alma thirty four to twenty two twenty two Yea, cry unto him against the power of your enemies.

column2: Alma 34:23 23 Yea, cry unto him against the devil, who is an enemy to all righteousness.
column3: Alma thirty four to twenty three twenty three Yea, cry unto him against the devil, who is an enemy to all righteousness.

column2: Alma 34:24 24 Cry unto him over the crops of your fields, that ye may prosper in them.
column3: Alma thirty four to twenty four twenty four Cry unto him over the crops of your fields, that ye may prosper in them.

column2: Alma 34:25 25 Cry over the flocks of your fields, that they may increase.
column3: Alma thirty four to twenty five twenty five Cry over the flocks of your fields, that they may increase.

column2: Alma 34:26 26 But this is not all; ye must pour out your souls in your closets, and your secret places, and in your wilderness.
column3: Alma thirty four to twenty six twenty six But this is not all; ye must pour out your souls in your closets, and your secret places, and in your wilderness.

column2: Alma 34:27 27 Yea, and when you do not cry unto the Lord, let your hearts be full, drawn out in prayer unto him continually for your welfare, and also for the welfare of those who are around you.
column3: Alma thirty four to twenty seven twenty seven Yea, and when you do not cry unto the Lord, let your hearts be full, drawn out in prayer unto him continually for your welfare, and also for the welfare of those who are around you.

column2: Alma 34:28 28 And now behold, my beloved brethren, I say unto you, do not suppose that this is all; for after ye have done all these things, if ye turn away the needy, and the naked, and visit not the sick and afflicted, and impart of your substance, if ye have, to those who stand in need--I say unto you, if ye do not any of these things, behold, your prayer is vain, and availeth you nothing, and ye are as hypocrites who do deny the faith.
column3: Alma thirty four to twenty eight twenty eight And now behold, my beloved brethren, I say unto you, do not suppose that this is all; for after ye have done all these things, if ye turn away the needy, and the naked, and visit not the sick and afflicted, and impart of your substance, if ye have, to those who stand in need-I say unto you, if ye do not any of these things, behold, your prayer is vain, and availeth you nothing, and ye are as hypocrites who do deny the faith.

column2: Alma 34:29 29 Therefore, if ye do not remember to be charitable, ye are as dross, which the refiners do cast out, (it being of no worth) and is trodden under foot of men.
column3: Alma thirty four to twenty nine twenty nine Therefore, if ye do not remember to be charitable, ye are as dross, which the refiners do cast out, (it being of no worth) and is trodden under foot of men.

column2: Alma 34:30 30 And now, my brethren, I would that, after ye have received so many witnesses, seeing that the holy scriptures testify of these things, ye come forth and bring fruit unto repentance.
column3: Alma thirty four to thirty thirty And now, my brethren, I would that, after ye have received so many witnesses, seeing that the holy scriptures testify of these things, ye come forth and bring fruit unto repentance.

column2: Alma 34:31 31 Yea, I would that ye would come forth and harden not your hearts any longer; for behold, now is the time and the day of your salvation; and therefore, if ye will repent and harden not your hearts, immediately shall the great plan of redemption be brought about unto you.
column3: Alma thirty four to thirty one thirty one Yea ,I would that ye would come forth and harden not your hearts any longer; for behold, now is the time and the day of your salvation; and therefore, if ye will repent and harden not your hearts, immediately shall the great plan of redemption be brought about unto you.

column2: Alma 34:32 32 For behold, this life is the time for men to prepare to meet God; yea, behold the day of this life is the day for men to perform their labors.
column3: Alma thirty four to thirty two thirty two For behold, this life is the time for men to prepare to meet God; yea, behold the day of this life is the day for men to perform their labors.

column2: Alma 34:33 33 And now, as I said unto you before, as ye have had so many witnesses, therefore, I beseech of you that ye do not procrastinate the day of your repentance until the end; for after this day of life, which is given us to prepare for eternity, behold, if we do not improve our time while in this life, then cometh the night of darkness wherein there can be no labor performed.
column3: Alma thirty four to thirty three thirty three And now, as I said unto you before, as ye have had so many witnesses, therefore, I beseech of you that ye do not procrastinate the day of your repentance until the end; for after this day of life, which is given us to prepare for eternity, behold, if we do not improve our time while in this life, then cometh the night of darkness wherein there can be no labor performed.

column2: Alma 34:34 34 Ye cannot say, when ye are brought to that awful crisis, that I will repent, that I will return to my God.
column3: Alma thirty four to thirty four thirty four Ye cannot say, when ye are brought to that awful crisis, that I will repent, that I will return to my God.

column2: Nay, ye cannot say this; for that same spirit which doth possess your bodies at the time that ye go out of this life, that same spirit will have power to possess your body in that eternal world.
column3: Nay, ye cannot say this; for that same spirit which doth possess your bodies at the time that ye go out of this life, that same spirit will have power to possess your body in that eternal world.

column2: Alma 34:35 35 For behold, if ye have procrastinated the day of your repentance even until death, behold, ye have become subjected to the spirit of the devil, and he doth seal you his; therefore, the Spirit of the Lord hath withdrawn from you, and hath no place in you, and the devil hath all power over you; and this is the final state of the wicked.
column3: Alma thirty four to thirty five thirty five For behold, if ye have procrastinated the day of your repentance even until death, behold, ye have become subjected to the spirit of the devil, and he doth seal you his; therefore, the Spirit of the Lord hath withdrawn from you, and hath no place in you, and the devil hath all power over you; and this is the final state of the wicked.

column2: Alma 34:36 36 And this I know, because the Lord hath said he dwelleth not in unholy temples, but in the hearts of the righteous doth he dwell; yea, and he has also said that the righteous shall sit down in his kingdom, to go no more out; but their garments should be made white through the blood of the Lamb.
column3: Alma thirty four to thirty six thirty six And this I know, because the Lord hath said he dwelleth not in unholy temples, but in the hearts of the righteous doth he dwell; yea, and he has also said that the righteous shall sit down in his kingdom, to go no more out; but their garments should be made white through the blood of the Lamb.

column2: Alma 34:37 37 And now, my beloved brethren, I desire that ye should remember these things, and that ye should work out your salvation with fear before God, and that ye should no more deny the coming of Christ;
column3: Alma thirty four to thirty seven thirty seven And now, my beloved brethren, I desire that ye should remember these things, and that ye should work out your salvation with fear before God, and that ye should no more deny the coming of Christ;

column2: Alma 34:38 38 That ye contend no more against the Holy Ghost, but that ye receive it, and take upon you the name of Christ; that ye humble yourselves even to the dust, and worship God, in whatsoever place ye may be in, in spirit and in truth; and that ye live in thanksgiving daily, for the many mercies and blessings which he doth bestow upon you.
column3: Alma thirty four to thirty eight thirty eight That ye contend no more against the Holy Ghost, but that ye receive it, and take upon you the name of Christ; that ye humble yourselves even to the dust, and worship God, in whatsoever place ye may be in, in spirit and in truth; and that ye live in thanksgiving daily, for the many mercies and blessings which he doth bestow upon you.

column2: Alma 34:39 39 Yea, and I also exhort you, my brethren, that ye be watchful unto prayer continually, that ye may not be led away by the temptations of the devil, that he may not overpower you, that ye may not become his subjects at the last day; for behold, he rewardeth you no good thing.
column3: Alma thirty four to thirty nine thirty nine Yea, and I also exhort you, my brethren, that ye be watchful unto prayer continually, that ye may not be led away by the temptations of the devil, that he may not overpower you, that ye may not become his subjects at the last day; for behold, he rewardeth you no good thing.

column2: Alma 34:40 40 And now my beloved brethren, I would exhort you to have patience, and that ye bear with all manner of afflictions; that ye do not revile against those who do cast you out because of your exceeding poverty, lest ye become sinners like unto them;
column3: Alma thirty four to forty forty And now my beloved brethren, I would exhort you to have patience, and that ye bear with all manner of afflictions; that ye do not revile against those who do cast you out because of your exceeding poverty, lest ye become sinners like unto them;
